info.author: Parth Dhar
info.description:
As of now, you can:

	1.Get the number of subscribers

	2.Send a Yo! to all subscribers

	3.Send a Yo! to a specific user

YoPy requires a Yo! API access token. You can get one by registering at http://dev.justyo.co/


YoPy requires the module requests. Get it from http://docs.python-requests.org/


Here is a Python 2 example :

	import yopy

	token = <your_api_token>

	username = "PARTHDHAR"

	link = "https://github.com/espice/YoPy"

	yo = yopy.Yo(token)

	print yo.number()

	yo.yoall(link)

	yo.youser(username, link)

Parth Dhar
2014
info.keywords: yo, Yo, Yo! , yo!, API, api, Yo api, python, python3, python27, python2, Parth Dhar, parthanium,

info.name: Yo-Py
info.summary: A simple Yo! API for python.
info.html_description:
As of now, you can:

1.Get the number of subscribers

2.Send a Yo! to all subscribers

3.Send a Yo! to a specific user

YoPy requires a Yo! API access token. You can get one by registering at http://dev.justyo.co/

YoPy requires the module requests. Get it from http://docs.python-requests.org/

Here is a Python 2 example :

import yopy

token = <your_api_token>

username = “PARTHDHAR”

link = “https://github.com/espice/YoPy”

yo = yopy.Yo(token)

print yo.number()

yo.yoall(link)

yo.youser(username, link)

Parth Dhar 2014
